short_summary: RFP - High Precision Port Entry Lights (Sector Lights)

full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: High Precision Port Entry Lights (Sector Lights)

#### Notice ID and Reference:

*   Notice ID: WS3679956663
*   Reference ID: WS3679956663-Doc3696151941

#### Tender Title:

*   English: High Precision Port Entry Lights (Sector Lights)
*   French: Feux d’entrée de port de haute précision (feux à secteurs)

#### Tender Details:

*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 28th, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Description:

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the supply and delivery of three (3) high precision port entry sector lights for aid to navigation structures in Ontario.

#### Contact Information:

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   Jonathan Lacroix
    *   Email: [jonathan.lacroix@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jonathan.lacroix@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: Not provided

#### Attachment and Notice URL:

*   No attachments are included with this notice.
*   Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483849?extsite=MTQ0ODM4NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483849?extsite=MTQ0ODM4NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time have been modified. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the new closing time of November 28th, 2022, 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
